Variables
SharpNeat.​Graphs
namespace SharpNeat.Graphs
DirectedConnectionUtils
internal static
DirectedConnectionUtils

Static utility methods related to working with DirectedConnection.

Functions
GetConnectionIndexBySourceNodeId
public static int GetConnectionIndexBySourceNodeId(
Span<DirectedConnection> connSpan,
int srcNodeId
)

Get the index of the first connection with the given source node ID.

If srcNodeId is not found and is less than one or more elements in array, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the first connection that is larger than srcNodeId.  If value is not found and value is greater than all connections in array, the negative number returned is the bitwise complement of the index of the last element plus 1.

Parameters
connSpan
Span<DirectedConnection>

The span of connections to search; these must be sorted by source node ID.

srcNodeId
int

The source node ID to search for.

Returns

The index of the first connection with the given source node index.

CloneAndMap
public static DirectedConnection CloneAndMap(
in DirectedConnection conn,
INodeIdMap nodeIdxById
)

Create a clone of the provided DirectedConnection, but with IDs mapped into a different ID space.

Parameters
conn
in DirectedConnection

The connection to clone.

nodeIdxById
INodeIdMap

The node ID mapping.

Returns

A new DirectedConnection.
